=================================================
 
Documentary looking at the abolition of slavery in Britain and the extraordinary choice by the government of the day to compensate slave owners for their loss of 'property'
 


1/2 Historian David Olusoga uncovers the untold stories of Britain's slave owners.
 


2/2 David Olusoga traces the propaganda war waged between pro-slavery lobby and abolitionists. 
  <a href="
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/articles/DM3CZJtRPtRYRYcZlGYdg5/the-secret-slave-owners" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/articles/DM3CZJtRPtRYRYcZlGYdg5/the-secret-slave-owners</a>
